text: Lenka (Born March 19, 1978) is an Australian singer-songwriter and actress best known for her song "The Show" which is from her debut album, Lenka (album)". The reason why her hit song The Show, is very popular, is because it is used in many advertisements, most notably Old Navy. Her song Everything at Once was used in a Windows 8 advertisement. ==References== Category:1978 births Category:Living people Category:Australian singer-songwriters Category:Australian actors
title: Lenka
